titleStmt.title: An elegie, upon the death, of that famous and faithfull minister and martyr, Mr. James Renwick Composed immediately after his execution at Edinburgh, 17. Feb. 1688.
titleStmt.author: Shields, Alexander, 1660?-1700.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printers name from Wing.
Imperfect; pages cropped, stained and torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
